turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three small pizzas, two of them pepperoni, one barbecue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicken barbecue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me add that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have 3 small pizzas, 2 pepperoni and 1 chicken bbq is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to add anything else to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make sure that those are gluten-free crusts?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me note that in the order, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have asked for your pizzas to be gluten free.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to add anything else to this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That'll be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it will cost $45.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to dine in, pickup, or have it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have it delivered.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note the cost doesn't include tip for the driver.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be arriving in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your pizzas.
